BasicInfo.short: Narrative provides hardware and software tools for automatic visual storytelling and known for the wearable camera narrative clip.

Products.name: Narrative Clip 2
Products.description: With an 8MP camera sensor, wireless connectivity and versatile wearing options, the Narrative Clip 2 adds on the success of its predecessor.
